manifesto.title: Most systems fail because the parts don't talk to each other
manifesto.content:
Most systems fail because the parts don't talk to each other. Planning splits from execution. Details don't get decided until it's too late.

I think differently about that problem.

domains.name: INFRASTRUCTURE
domains.description: Platforms that don't depend on trends or vendor decisions. Built to survive.

artifacts.title: THE ENCORE PLATFORM
artifacts.spec: Legacy modernization. 99.9% uptime. 40,000+ users. Replaced core infrastructure without breaking the system.
artifacts.result: System survived three technological shifts without losing its shape.

artifacts.title: VISUAL GOVERNANCE
artifacts.spec: E-commerce, print, retail, campaigns, social. Built a system teams could extend without breaking it.
artifacts.result: $10M+ annual commerce. Visual coherence survived team transitions and organizational pressure.

artifacts.title: HOMELAB STACK
artifacts.spec: Ubuntu. Docker. Self-hosted. No cloud dependencies.
artifacts.result: Family infrastructure. Media server. Backups. AI compute. Works when the internet doesn't.

domains.name: METHODS
domains.definition: How to build so it doesn't break.
domains.description: Frameworks that scale because they're clear. Systems designed to be operated.

artifacts.title: SAVEPOINT PROTOCOL
artifacts.spec: Documented moments of stability. Weekly reviews. Quarterly audits. A way to keep context stable so teams can move fast.
artifacts.result: Teams recover faster from context loss. Move bolder. Keep institutional memory through turnover.
artifacts.hub_context: Usable by anyone. Shows how I think about cognitive versioning.

artifacts.title: ORDER OF THE Ã†THERWRIGHT
artifacts.spec: Three pillars. Clarity. Consistency. Coherence. That's how systems survive.
artifacts.result: Framework for building culture and infrastructure simultaneously. Used by founders and design leaders.

artifacts.title: MODERNIST HOMESTEAD
artifacts.spec: Zero-willpower meal systems. Italian and Thai supply chains. Chemical constraints as design parameters.
artifacts.result: Family reliably feeds itself. Reliability doesn't depend on willpower.
artifacts.hub_context: A stress-test of constraint systems applied to recipes.

domains.name: DESIGN
domains.description: Visual thinking that survives organizational pressure. Research into resilience.

artifacts.title: NEW CITY
artifacts.spec: 40+ entity graph stress-testing infrastructure failure. What happens when systems fail. How do humans respond.
artifacts.result: Interactive narrative modeling resilience under pressure.

artifacts.title: VISUAL SYSTEMS RESEARCH
artifacts.spec: How to build a visual language teams can extend without breaking it. Constraint hierarchies. Distributed autonomy.
artifacts.result: Framework for design coherence without centralized control.

artifacts.title: MATH ON TAPE
artifacts.spec: Tactile mathematics. Making abstract graspable through interaction.
artifacts.result: Used as primary teaching tool. Understanding deepens when systems map to multiple cognitive channels.
